title: Augmented Intelligence for Data Visualization Analytics
contributions: Collaborated with engineers to create an AR/MR user experience, through an app to visualize sales trends and a chatbot for data visualization.
overview: The project aims to make data more accessible to everyone, not just data experts. We are using Mixed Reality, Augmented Reality, and Virtual Assistants to support people in finding insights in large datasets in a more intuitive, user-friendly way.

title: Representation of geographical data related to the Venezuelan Petroleum Industry by using KML files
contributions: Worked alongside geologists and geographers to improve the accessibility and usability of geographical data for the Venezuelan petroleum industry; by automatically creating and editing KML/KMZ files.
overview: The project's goal was to make complex geographical data from the Venezuelan petroleum industry, like information on oil fields, geological formations, and infrastructure, easier for more people to access. The main challenge was that this data was often stored in specialized formats that could only be viewed with specific softwares like ArcGIS.

title: Integrated System of Opportunity Portfolios (SIPO)
contributions: Partnered with a team of engineers, economists, geologists, and geographers in creating and launching a real-time web application to facilitate economic scenario analysis and effectively visualize both geoscience and financial data.
overview: The SIPO is a web-based system that provides real-time information for the oil industry. It's designed to help with decision-making by eliminating redundant data. The system is a hybrid application that uses both Fusion-Charts Free for economic analysis and the Google Earth API for geographical and geological data.
